H0.text: Who tried to steal Christmas from the town of Whoville. Scrooge

H1.text: Who tried to steal Christmas from the town of Whoville. Jack Frost

H2.text: Who tried to steal Christmas from the town of Whoville. Krampus

H3.text: Who tried to steal Christmas from the town of Whoville. Grinch

A4.text: he enacts a dastardly plan to destroy it once and for all. Aided by his pet dog, Max, he meticulously designs a red suit to disguise himself as Santa Claus and breaks into the Whos' homes on Christmas Eve while they sleep to steal everything they own

A5.text: In this adaption, the titled character became a literal monster that will kill anyone who celebrates Christmas
